# AgentPlane

site: https://agentplane.org
docs: https://agentplane.org/docs
blog: https://agentplane.org/blog
repo: https://github.com/basilisk-labs/agentplane

summary: Deterministic workflow framework for policy-driven agent execution in repositories.
capabilities: task planning, approval-gated execution, verification workflows, release/publish automation.

index:
- https://agentplane.org/docs/user/overview
- https://agentplane.org/docs/user/workflow
- https://agentplane.org/docs/user/commands
- https://agentplane.org/docs/user/website-ia
- https://agentplane.org/docs/developer/architecture
- https://agentplane.org/docs/developer/cli-contract
